mapper.sql: select m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.is_frame, m.menu_type,m.type,m.client_type, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.icon, m.create_time from system_menu m
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.type,m.client_type,m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from system_menu m right join system_company_info cc on cc.type = m.type where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 and cc.company_id = #{companyId} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path,u.`company_id`, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.type,m.client_type,m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM SYSTEM_USER u LEFT JOIN system_user_role ur ON u.`company_id` = ur.`company_id` AND u.`user_id` = ur.`user_id` LEFT JOIN system_role r ON r.`role_id` = ur.`role_id` AND r.`company_id` = ur.`company_id` LEFT JOIN system_role_menu rm ON rm.`company_id` = r.`company_id` AND rm.`role_id` = r.`role_id` LEFT JOIN system_menu m ON m.`menu_id` = rm.`menu_id` where u.user_id = #{userId} and u.company_id = #{companyId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = '0' AND r.status = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type,m.type,m.client_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from system_menu m left join system_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join system_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join system_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id where ur.user_id = #{params.userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0
order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id from system_menu m left join system_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and m.menu_id not in (select m.parent_id from system_menu m inner join system_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id and rm.role_id = #{roleId}) order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.* from system_menu m left join system_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join system_role ro on rm.role_id = ro.role_id where ro.role_code = #{role} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path,m.component, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.type,m.client_type,m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time,m.update_time from system_menu m left join system_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join system_role ro on rm.role_id = ro.role_id where ro.role_code = #{role} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
SELECT m.* FROM system_menu m WHERE m.menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: insert into system_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, path, component, is_frame, menu_type, type, client_type, visible, status, perms, icon, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{menu.menuId}, #{menu.parentId}, #{menu.menuName}, #{menu.orderNum}, #{menu.path}, #{menu.component}, #{menu.isFrame}, #{menu.menuType}, #{menu.type}, #{menu.clientType}, #{menu.visible}, #{menu.status}, #{menu.perms}, #{menu.icon}, #{menu.remark}, #{menu.createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select count(1) from system_menu where parent_id = #{menuId}

select m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.is_frame, m.menu_type,m.type,m.client_type, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.icon, m.create_time from system_menu m
right join system_company_info cc on cc.type = m.client_type where m.type = '1' and cc.company_id = #{companyId}
